title: Plug in
text: Plug in the values for the equation. Choose a point to be the $$x_2$$ and $$y_2$$ pair, and use the other as the $$x_1$$ and $$y_1$$ pair. We get $$\sqrt{{\left(5-2\right)}^2+{\left(4-0\right)}^2}=\sqrt{25}$$.

title: Simplify
text: Simplify the answer into one term. $$\sqrt{25}=5$$
